lead_paragraph: A gunman opened fire on New Year revelers at a packed nightclub on the shores of Istanbul's Bosphorus waterway on Sunday killing at least 39 people, including many foreigners, then fled the scene.
snippet: A gunman opened fire on New Year revelers at a packed nightclub on the shores of Istanbul's Bosphorus waterway on Sunday killing at least 39 people, including many foreigners, then fled the scene....

headline.main: Gunman Kills 39 in Istanbul Nightclub, Manhunt Under Way
headline.print_headline: Gunman Kills 39 in Istanbul Nightclub, Manhunt Under Way
